attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
MP's allowances should be slashed and a salary equivalent to that of a skilled worker should be paid.

only legitimate expenses like travel and running of constituency offices should be paid.

A maximum salary of £50k per MP with Leaders given a leader allowance.

rejection.details:
There is a similar petition at:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/MPrenumeration/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
